question: Hi :-)I`m 15 weeks pregnant, in the past i was on medication for high blood pressure. Now i was again put on medication by my doctor. They are so concerned about me developing preeclampsia that the told me to take a child dose of aspirin every day 75mg together with my medication wich is Methyldopa. I have heard that pregnant women should not be taking aspirin at all.. Is it safe for me to do so?
title: taking aspirin while pregnant
